oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Autograph album of Lt. James R. DeLaunay kept at Johnson's Island prison
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 3rd Lt. DeLaunay was from Shelby County and served in Co. I, 38th Tenn. Inf. at Shiloh and other western battles. He kept this album full of autographs of fellow Confederate officers imprisoned in Johnson's Island prison camp in Lake Erie near Sandusky, Ohio. His album is a meticulously compiled set of autographs, unit affliations, and addresses of his fellow officer POWs, organized by state.
